tagline: Store and share your personal documents — safely.
subtitle: Invoices, prescriptions, and important files in one trusted place.
firebaseNotConfigured: Firebase is not configured in this environment.
privacyPolicyPageSubtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your data.
refundPolicyPageSubtitle: We do not offer refunds, but you can cancel anytime.
profilePageSubtitle: Manage your account and profile photo.
profileDeleteConfirm: Delete this user from the server?
profilePleaseLogin: Please login to view your profile.
profileNameHint: Update how your name appears in DocSpot.
profilePhotoHint: Upload a photo for your account
profilePhotoSyncFirst: Sync first to create a server record.
profilePhotoQualityHint: Lower quality saves storage. Higher quality looks sharper.
profilePhotoUploadCors: Upload failed due to a network/CORS block. If you use a private S3 bucket, allow CORS for your frontend origin and allow PUT with Content-Type.
endpointsPageSubtitle: All backend endpoints and their auth requirements. Base URL:
servicesBody: Save, update, and share your files with confidence — from prescriptions to everyday documents.
servicePrescriptionBody: Store and update prescriptions, then share them with doctors when needed. Add a quick voice note for context.
serviceDocumentBody: Keep invoices and receipts organized — and share a link when you choose.
serviceOtherBody: Upload any important file, track versions, and share securely.
getStartedModalTitle: What do you want to store?
getStartedModalBody: Choose a type to open a demo page.
planBody: A simple free plan to start — with clear limits and transparent ads.
freePlanBody: Up to 100MB storage. Ads help keep the service running.
privacyBody: You control what you upload and what you share. No manual storage of credentials in the browser.
testimonialsBody: A few words from early users (demo).
testimonial1Quote: Finally, a calm place to keep my medical files.
testimonial2Quote: Sharing a prescription with my doctor is faster now.
testimonial3Quote: Simple UI, clear storage limits, and feels private by default.
faqA1: No. Storage is private-by-default and links are signed/short-lived.
faqQ2: Can I upload PDFs and images?
faqA2: Yes. Images and PDFs are supported in the app where uploads are available.
faqQ3: What happens when I reach my storage limit?
faqA3: Uploads are blocked once you exceed the hard cap. You can delete files to free space.
aboutBody: DocSpot helps you keep important personal documents in one place, ready to share when you need them.
contactBody: Contact options will be added here soon (email/support).
aboutPageSubtitle: DocSpot is an independent software project focused on safe document storage and sharing.
aboutPrivacyNote: Personal identifiers (phone, SSN, banking details) are not displayed publicly.
contactPageSubtitle: For help, questions, or feedback — reach us by email.
supportBody: Email is the fastest way to reach the team.
contactPrivacyNote: We keep contact details minimal and privacy-friendly.
noDemoData: No demo items. Add your real data later.
prescriptionPageSubtitle: A simple place to store and review prescriptions.
prescriptionCreateHint: Create a group with your first report.
prescriptionDeleteConfirm: Delete this prescription group and all its reports and files? This cannot be undone.
prescriptionSheetHint: Add files, optional audio, and notes.
filesRequired: At least one file is required.
fileTypeError: Only images, PDFs, or audio are allowed.
fileCountError: You can upload up to {{max}} files.
reportHint: Add or update the report details. You can upload files after the report is created.
attachmentsHint: Upload images, PDFs, or audio files.
shareHint: Generate a read-only public link that expires automatically.
micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission is blocked. Enable it in your browser/site settings and try again.
micNotSupported: Audio recording is not supported on this device/browser.
micNeedsSecureContext: Audio recording requires a secure context (HTTPS or localhost).
micBusy: Microphone is busy. Close other apps using it and try again.
micGenericError: Could not start audio recording. Please try again.
micEnableStep1: Open the site in Chrome and tap the lock icon (or site info) in the address bar.
micEnableStep3: Return to the app and tap Record again.
micEnableNote: If you don't see the option, clear the site's settings in Chrome and reload.
textNotePlaceholder: Optional notes about symptoms, instructions, etc.
invoicePageSubtitle: Store invoices and receipts in one place.
invoiceCreateHint: Create a group with your first invoice.
invoiceSheetHint: Add files, optional audio, and notes.
invoiceDeleteConfirm: Delete this invoice group and all its reports and files? This cannot be undone.
objectCreateHint: Create a group with your first record.
objectSheetHint: Add files, optional audio, and notes.
objectDeleteConfirm: Delete this object group and all its reports and files? This cannot be undone.
comingSoon: Google sign-in is ready once you add Firebase env vars.
